document_data.name: Ironskin
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ironskin''''', sometimes called '''''iron skin''''' or '''''iron skins''''', was a touch-based [[divine]] [[spell]] that granted immunity to physical attacks.
document_data.Effects: ''Iron skin'' protected a single target from attacks from [[weapon]]s, both enchanted and normal, as well as other physical attacks, such as those from [[animal]]s. However, the recipient of the spell was still affected by [[magic]]al barrages. Every physical attack reduced a 'layer' of the skin, but a more experienced [[priest]] could increase the number of layers.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, as well as a small [[iron]] stone worth no less than 5 [[gp]].
